consequences.consequence: Let the group scroll through the photos on your phone for 30 seconds.
Don't use your legs for the rest of the game. If you have to get up, crawl.
Guess who in the group makes the most money. You can choose yourself.
Tell the group which player you think would make the worst parent and why. You can't pick yourself.
Stick your foot in a toilet and flush.
Let the player sitting to your right read the last three text messages your sent out loud. You can't check beforehand!
Wear a sock on your hand for the rest of the game.
Call a business and tell them you're not coming in tomorrow.
